#1
# Building Occupancy and Internal Gains Data
# Compatible with Modelica.Blocks.Sources.CombiTimeTable
# Based on VDI 2078 / DIN EN 15251 German residential patterns
# Format matches GreenCity MF5_WholeYear.txt structure
#
# Building: Three-zone residential (Living, Cellar/Hobby, Roof/Office)
# Household: Family of 4 (2 adults, 2 children)
# Pattern: 10-day winter scenario with weekday/weekend variation
#
# Columns:
#   1: Time [s] - seconds from simulation start
#   2: nPersons_living [-] - Number of people in living zone
#   3: nPersons_cellar [-] - Number of people in cellar zone
#   4: nPersons_roof [-] - Number of people in roof/office zone
#   5: P_appliances_living [W] - Appliance power in living zone
#   6: P_appliances_cellar [W] - Appliance power in cellar zone
#   7: P_appliances_roof [W] - Appliance power in roof zone
#   8: Presence [%] - Overall building presence (0-100%)
#
# Heat gain per person: ~80W (seated, light activity per VDI 2078)
#
double occupancy(241,8)
